hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Ayyub that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Do not face towards the Qiblah nor turn your backs toward it when defecating or urinating, rather face toward the east or the west

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ اسْتِدْبَارِ الْقِبْلَةِ، عِنْدَ الْحَاجَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Turning One's Back Towards The Qiblah When Relieving Oneself
